name: Dreamforce
description: End-to-end Dreamforce execution: planning, promotion, logistics, onsite coordination, and follow-up

name: Tailoring to a technical audience
description: Built a repeatable multi-channel content engine focused on translating product value into narratives
expandedDescription: Built a repeatable multi-channel content engine focused on translating product value into narratives: The big idea is making sure products actually resonate with the people they're built for. I ran multi-channel campaigns where our ICP actually hangs out (for us: LinkedIn + Reddit) and built a repeatable content engine that made a technical product feel clear, human, and worth stopping for. The goal wasn't "post more." It was translating product value into stories people actually get, then iterating based on what landed.

name: AI sales agent POC

name: Campaigns & Collabs
description: Produced creator-led brand integrations with clean storytelling and product placement that doesn't kill authenticity

name: Frost Undergraduate Research (published + talks)
